feed.title: Mastodon Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mastodon: 2.5.3
entry.content:
• Updated look for link previews and the News tab
  • Bug fixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for Mastodon: 2.6.0
entry.content: • Added option to donate to Mastodon in-app when connected to our flagship server. This option will not appear when using a 3rd party server to avoid confusion. Please check if the 3rd party server you're using accepts donations through their website.

entry.title: New release for Mastodon: 2.6.1
entry.content: • Added option to donate to Mastodon in-app when connected to our flagship server. This option will not appear when using a 3rd party server to avoid confusion. Please check if the 3rd party server you're using accepts donations through their website.
